T02TD2716E:82b-1: shukla manydzu gho sha p'u dza bi dhi n'a ma /
T02TD2716E:82b-3: 'jam dbyangs dkar po mchod pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba /
T02TD2716E:82b-4: rje btsun 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2716E:82b-5: lha yi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba //
T02TD2716E:82b-6: ting 'dzin bsgom pa bzlas pa dang //
T02TD2716E:82b-7: bstod dang mchod pa phyag bgyi ba'i //
T02TD2716E:82b-8: yan lag drug tu rgyal bas gsungs //
T02TD2716E:82b-9: de nas sngags pas sgrub pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas mchog tu gtsang bar byas nas //
T02TD2716E:82b-11: tshags kyis yang dag par btsags pa'i lha'i chu sngags 'di lan gsum gyis sbyang bar bya'o //
T02TD2716E:82b-12: aom a'a:badzrod ke ai mra tam bha ba h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD2716E:82b-14: ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni //
T02TD2716E:82b-15: de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol ltar //
T02TD2716E:82b-16: lha yi chu ni dag pa yis //
T02TD2716E:82b-17: de bzhin bdag gis khrus bgyi'o //
T02TD2716E:82b-18: aom a'a:sarba ta th'a ga ta bhi she ka ta sa ma ya shri ye h'um /
T02TD2716E:82b-20: de nas hr'im tr'am aom h'um kham bam zhes pa de bzhin gshegs pa drug dag pa'i phyir /
T02TD2716E:82b-21: dbang po drug la dgod par bya ste /
T02TD2716E:82b-27: snying ga rnams su rim pa ji lta bar sngon du sa bon drug brjod cing /
T02TD2716E:82b-28: sor mo lnga'i rtse mos reg nas srog rtsol bya'o //
T02TD2716E:82b-30: zhes pas lag pa dang rkang pa dag la 'thor zhing /
T02TD2716E:82b-31: aom hr'i: sv'a h'a zhes pas zhal bsil lo //
T02TD2716E:82b-32: aom na mo bha ga ba te pushpa ke tu r'a dz'a y'a ta th'a ga t'a ya aarha te samyaksam buddh'a ya /
T02TD2716E:82b-33: tadya th'a pushpe pushpe ma h'a pushpe su pushpe pushpo dbha ba /
T02TD2716E:82b-35: pushp'a wa k'i rnne sv'a h'a /
T02TD2716E:82b-36: zhes pa 'di lan bdun gyis me tog sbyang ba'o //
T02TD2716E:83a-0: de nas g-yon pa'i mthe bong dang srin lag @83a * //
T02TD2716E:83a-2: aom a'a:h'um gis lus dang ngag dang yid byin gyis brlabs par bya'o /
T02TD2716E:83a-3: yang de bzhin du me tog gcig blangs la //
T02TD2716E:83a-4: aom ma ni dha ri badzri ni ma h'a pra ti tog gcig blangs la //
T02TD2716E:83a-5: aom ma ni dha ri badzri ni ma h'a pra ti s'a re raksha raksha m'am sarbba satvashtham h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD2716E:83a-6: 'dis bdag nyid kyi mgo bor bsrung bar bya'o //
T02TD2716E:83a-7: aom sva bh'u me badzr'i bha ba h'um /
T02TD2716E:83a-8: 'di dag gis dkyil 'khor bya ba'i sa la bsang gtor bya zhing sbyangs la /
T02TD2716E:83a-9: de nas aom badzra satva sarbba bi ghna nu t+s'a ra ya h'um phat /
T02TD2716E:83a-10: zhes pas g-yon skor gyis bgegs bskrad par bya'o //
T02TD2716E:83a-11: de nas srog chags med pa'i ba byung ngam tsandan la sogs pa dri bzang po'i chus lag pa g-yas pas dkyil 'khor zlum por nye bar byugs la /
T02TD2716E:83a-12: tshigs su bcad pa gnyis po bklag par bya'o //
T02TD2716E:83a-13: ba yi lci ba chur bcas sbyin pa yang dag byi dor tshul khrims dang //
T02TD2716E:83a-14: srog chags phra mo'ang bsal ba bzod pa bya ba nyer gnas brtson 'grus so //
T02TD2716E:83a-15: sems rtse gcig de'i skad cig bsam gtan ri mo mdzes 'bar shes rab yin //
T02TD2716E:83a-16: thub pa'i mandal bgyis las pha rol phyin drug 'di dag thob 'gyur zhing //
T02TD2716E:83a-17: kha dog gser du 'gyur zhing nang kun las ni rnam par grol bar 'gyur //
T02TD2716E:83a-18: lha dang mi las ches lhag 'gyur dang zla ba lta bu'i mdzes pa 'bar //
T02TD2716E:83a-19: 'dir ni lus kyi las bgyis pa las sangs rgyas pa yi khyim dag tu //
T02TD2716E:83a-20: nor dang gser gyis yang dag 'byor zhing rgyal po'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur //
T02TD2716E:83a-21: de nas skyong nul byas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su //
T02TD2716E:83a-22: g-yas pa'i mthe bong bzhag nas /
T02TD2716E:83a-23: mdzub mos zla ba gang ba lta bu'i re kh'a aom badzra re khe su re khe h'um phat /
T02TD2716E:83a-24: ces pas g-yas skor du bya ste /
T02TD2716E:83a-25: lag pa g-yon pas me tog gcig blangs la g-yas pa'i rgyab tu me tog de bzhag nas /
T02TD2716E:83a-26: aom su re khe sarba ta th'a ga t'a dhi tishthantu sv'a h'a /
T02TD2716E:83a-27: zhes pas lag pa'i rgyab bsgyur te /
T02TD2716E:83a-28: me tog de dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2716E:83a-29: de nas lag pa bkrus nas g-yon pa dang g-yas pa dag gis me tog blangs la /
T02TD2716E:83a-30: aom tsandrarka bi ma le sv'a h'a /
T02TD2716E:83a-31: zhes pas dkyil 'khor la bkram par bya'o /
T02TD2716E:83a-32: de ltar zla ba dang nyi ma'i ngo bos dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02TD2716E:83a-33: rang gi snying gar aa yig yongs su gyur pa'i zla ba la dh'i:yig bsams la /
T02TD2716E:83b-0: de'i 'od zer gyi dra bas @83b nam mkhar bcom ldan 'das snang bar byas pa //
T02TD2716E:83b-1: sngags 'dis spyan drang bar bya ste /
T02TD2716E:83b-2: aom sha rad ma la ma dhy'a hna ga ga no pa ma /
T02TD2716E:83b-3: dharma dh'a tu sva bh'a lba bhag b'a na manydzu gho sha ai h'a gactsha manda le aa dhishth'a nam ku ru ja:h'um bam ho: zhes pas dkyil 'khor du spyan drang ba dang /
T02TD2716E:83b-6: yongs su mnyes pa rnams byas nas //
T02TD2716E:83b-7: aom pra ba ra satk'a ra shr'i manydzu gho sha aargham p'a dyam a'a nytsa ma nam proksha nam pra ti tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02TD2716E:83b-8: de nas sems gzhan du ma yengs par yang dag pa'i dad pa dang /
T02TD2716E:83b-9: lhag pa'i bsam pas mchod par bya ste /
T02TD2716E:83b-10: dbus su aom aa ra pa tsa n'a ya badzra pushpe dh'i: sv'a h'a /
T02TD2716E:83b-11: mdun du aom dz'a li ni pra bh'a ya badzra pushpe ram sv'a h'a /
T02TD2716E:83b-12: rgyab tu aom tsandra pra bh'a ya badzra pushpe sam sv'a h'a /
T02TD2716E:83b-13: g-yas su aom ke shi n+ye badzra pushpe tsam sv'a h'a /
T02TD2716E:83b-14: g-yon du aom au pa ke shi n+ye badzra pushpe nam sv'a h'a /
T02TD2716E:83b-20: zhal zas la sogs pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod nas /
T02TD2716E:83b-21: gtor ma'i sngags kyis gtor ma dbul bar bya ste /
T02TD2716E:83b-22: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am a'a dya nutpa nna tv'ad aom a'a:h'um ho: 'di dag gis gtor ma sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2716E:83b-23: de nas aom aa ra pa tsa n'a ya /
T02TD2716E:83b-24: ku m'a ri da ha na daksh'a ya /
T02TD2716E:83b-25: tsandra k'anti ma ni pra bh'a ya /
T02TD2716E:83b-26: khangga pustam ka by'a gr'a ya /
T02TD2716E:83b-27: hasta yam manydzu ba ni wa ra pra d'a ya /
T02TD2716E:83b-42: raksha ba ra na gupta ku ru aom a'a:dh'i:h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD2716E:83b-44: de nas mngon par bstod par bya'o //
T02TD2716E:83b-45: de nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2716E:83b-46: rmongs pa'i blo yis bdag gis ca nis kyang //
T02TD2716E:83b-47: nongs pa bgyis dang bgyis stsal gang ci'ang rung //
T02TD2716E:83b-48: gang phyir lus can kun gyi skyabs yin phyir //
T02TD2716E:83b-49: de kun mgon po khyod kyis bzod par 'tshal //
T02TD2716E:83b-50: de nas tshigs bcad 'dis smon lam bya ste /
T02TD2716E:83b-51: dge ba 'di yis bdag nyid ni //
T02TD2716E:83b-52: sangs rgyas nyid du mngon gyur nas //
T02TD2716E:83b-53: 'gro kun gting mtha' med pa yi //
T02TD2716E:83b-54: srid pa'i mtsho las sgrol gyur cig / de nas tshigs bcad 'dis gshegs su gsol bar bya ste /
T02TD2716E:83b-55: khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad //
T02TD2716E:84a-2: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang //
T02TD2716E:84a-3: slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol //
T02TD2716E:84a-4: tshul khrims tsandan gyis lus byugs //
T02TD2716E:84a-5: bsam gtan dag gi gos gyon zhing //
T02TD2716E:84a-6: byang chub yan lag me tog bkram //
T02TD2716E:84a-7: ji ltar bde bar bzhugs su gsol //
T02TD2716E:84a-8: de nas sngags kyi rgyal po yi ge brgya pa gdon par bya ste /
T02TD2716E:84a-9: aom badzra sa tva sa ma ya /
T02TD2716E:84a-11: badzra sa tva tve no pa /
T02TD2716E:84a-12: tishthi dri dho me bha ba /
T02TD2716E:84a-13: su to shyo me bha ba /
T02TD2716E:84a-14: su po shyo me bha ba /
T02TD2716E:84a-15: aa nu rakto me bha ba /
T02TD2716E:84a-17: sarba karma su tsa mi tsittam shri ya:ku ru h'um /
T02TD2716E:84a-18: ha ha ha ha ho:bha ga b'an /
T02TD2716E:84a-20: badzra m'a ma munytsa badzr'i bha ba /
T02TD2716E:84a-21: ma h'a sa ma ya sa tva a'a: 'jam dbyangs dkar po aa ra pa tsa na mchod pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba slob dpon mi pham bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2716E:84a-23: // / pandi ta chen po shr'i ba na ratna'i spyan sngar /
T02TD2716E:84a-24: chos 'khor lo ts'a bas bsgyur ba las dge slong rgya mtshos bcos pa'o//
